scenes.text: Noah Lyles is the world's fastest man right now.
scenes.prompt: A muscular runner in athletic wear crossing a finish line with arms raised in victory. A gold medal icon and world record indicator float beside him. Speed lines trail behind. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
The muscular runner in athletic wear shaking his head 'no' at a fuel tank labeled 'WILLPOWER'. He rejects it completely. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
The muscular runner in athletic wear shaking his head 'no' at a whip or strict ruler labeled 'DISCIPLINE'. He rejects this too. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
The muscular runner in athletic wear wearing engineer goggles, working on a blueprint or system diagram. He builds rather than chases. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Close-up of the muscular runner in athletic wear with 'ADHD' letters beside his head. His expression is matter-of-fact. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: He knows his brain can't be trusted to show up consistently.
scenes.prompt: A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, shown as unreliable with flickering on/off signals. The muscular runner in athletic wear looks at it with understanding, not frustration. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: So he doesn't rely on it.
scenes.prompt: The muscular runner in athletic wear turning away from a cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe. He walks toward something else. The brain is not the solution. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: He relies on his internal rhythm instead.
scenes.prompt: The muscular runner in athletic wear with a metronome or heartbeat rhythm visualization around him. The rhythm is steady and consistent. He moves in sync with it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A running track shown from the same angle. The word 'SAME' floats above it. Consistency emphasized. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Headphones with musical notes and a playlist icon. The word 'SAME' floats beside it. Consistency emphasized. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A figure doing stretching exercises. The word 'SAME' floats beside them. Consistency emphasized. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

The muscular runner in athletic wear shown in three identical running stride positions side by side like a motion study. Each pose is exactly the same. The word 'SAME' floats above. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Seven squares in a horizontal row representing days of the week. Six squares have green checkmarks inside. One square on the right is empty for rest day. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Multiple weekly calendars stacked showing the same pattern repeating. Week after week. Endless consistency. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
The word 'VARIATION' behind a locked padlock. The routine is sealed and unchangeable. Consistency is enforced. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, sitting idle with a 'closed' sign. Thinking is not required. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: When the gun goes off, he says something interesting: "I'm not thinking. My body already knows what to do."
scenes.prompt: The muscular runner in athletic wear in starting blocks as a starting gun fires. A speech bubble shows 'My body already knows'. His expression is calm and automatic. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person with a dismissive expression, waving one hand to the side as if pushing something away. A speech bubble shows 'That's not discipline.' Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person with a confident smile, pointing one finger upward like making an important point. A speech bubble shows 'That's design.' Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

The muscular runner in athletic wear and a cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, standing side by side facing the viewer. The runner has one arm around the brain in a friendly gesture, both smiling. Behind them, a boxing ring icon with a large X drawn through it. Black background. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

The muscular runner in athletic wear mid-sprint, running powerfully. A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, runs alongside him in perfect sync, both heading the same direction. The brain looks enthusiastic like a supportive teammate. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: The margin between gold and silver is one five-hundredth of a second.
scenes.prompt: Two medals shown side by side: gold and silver. A tiny gap labeled '1/500 second' separates them. The difference is microscopic. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Those routines give him that edge.
scenes.prompt: The muscular runner in athletic wear crossing the finish line just barely ahead of another runner. His routines visualized as gears powering him forward. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Why wouldn't you use the same logic?
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person with a thoughtful expression, one hand on chin. The muscular runner's routine system floats beside them as an option. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: A psychologist at NYU named Peter Gollwitzer wanted to test this.
scenes.prompt: A psychologist (bald man with hair on the sides, wearing glasses and a lab coat) standing in front of a sign reading 'NYU'. A nameplate below shows 'PETER GOLLWITZER'. He holds research papers in both hands. Black background. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: He took students trying to exercise over Christmas break and divided them into two groups.

global_context.scene_description: Minimalist cartoon illustration of six standing cartoon people divided into two groups of three by a thick white vertical line. Each person wears workout clothes. A Christmas tree with a star on top stands centered in the background behind the dividing line. Clean white line art on a black background.
